metadata.synopsis: Six Prague residents pursue bizarre rituals. Mr. Peony (Petr Meissel) builds a chicken costume to wear while enacting homicidal fantasies toward neighbor Mrs. Loubalova (Gabriela Wilhelmová), who does the same dressed as a dominatrix. Their mail carrier, Mrs. Malkova (Barbora Hrzanova), inhales tiny balls of bread. Newsstand operator Mr. Kula (Jirí Lábus) obsessively watches the broadcasts of news anchor Mrs. Beltinska (Anna Wetlinská), whose husband (Pavel Novy) regularly scrubs his body.

reviews: The film's handmade look fits the material, since it's about desires too personal to be mass-produced.
Agreeably witty and bizarre, but patience is required to sustain interest in its intricately oddball, non-verbalized story for nearly an hour-and-a-half.
